email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for this route. The vessel has a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280 meters. The starting freight quote is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were expecting. Would you be able to come down to the low 50s, say $50.75? Also, could you confirm the laycan dates? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I can offer a revised rate of $51.00 per metric ton, which is competitive given the current market. The laycan for the MV Ocean Star is October 15-20. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $51.00 sounds reasonable. Let’s proceed with that. Can you confirm the demurrage terms? Also, please send over the full charter party agreement for review. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that $51.00 works for you. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. I’ll send over the charter party agreement shortly. Let me know if you need any further details. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the details. The demurrage rate is acceptable. I’ve reviewed the charter party agreement, and everything looks in order. Let’s finalize the deal. Please confirm the laycan dates once more, and we’ll proceed with the paperwork. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, confirmed laycan is October 15-20. I’ll proceed with the final paperwork and send it over for your signature. Thanks for your cooperation, and looking forward to working together on this shipment. Best, Sarah
